External libraries
==================

spdlog
------
https://github.com/gabime/spdlog

Mosquitto
---------
We use a modified version of the original mosquitto library that can be linked statically.
http://mosquitto.org/download/

c-ares
------
http://c-ares.haxx.se/

git-cmake-format
----------------
https://github.com/kbenzie/git-cmake-format
